channel.title: bp on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in bp on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Fun 3rd of 4th lesson at BP
item.description: 00:03 Friday 21 June 2019 JST JB got me 8 hours of lessons at BP over the 4 Thursdays in June. This was the 3rd lesson, during which we practiced taking taxis, ordering in a restaurant, and something else. Yoko M wasn’t there, but she will be back next week. Yoko N volunteered a couple of times to go first!
